LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.label: Herbalism (Simple)
LanguageData.AYHerbsSimple.description: Grants the ability to cultivate simple herbs.
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.label: Herbalism (Intermediate)
LanguageData.AYHerbsIntermediate.description: Grants the ability to cultivate uncommon herbs.
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.label: Herbalism (Complex)
LanguageData.AYHerbsComplex.description: Grants the ability to cultivate complex herbs.
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.label: Herbalism Yields
LanguageData.AYHerbsYield.description: Grants the ability to improve yields from apothecary herbs.
LanguageData.AYTallow.label: Tallow
LanguageData.AYTallow.description: Grants the ability to make tallow and associated products.
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.label: Charcoal
LanguageData.AYCharcoal.description: Grants the ability to make charcoal and associated products.
LanguageData.AYPowders.label: Powders
LanguageData.AYPowders.description: Grants the ability to grind and dry plant materials into powders.
LanguageData.AYExtracts.label: Extracts
LanguageData.AYExtracts.description: Grants the ability to extract useful oils and other elements from plant materials.
LanguageData.AYSalts.label: Salts
LanguageData.AYSalts.description: Grants the ability to make salts, an early form of medicinal use prior to later pills.
LanguageData.AYTeas.label: Herbal Teas
LanguageData.AYTeas.description: Grants the ability to prepare herbal teas.
LanguageData.AYElixirs.label: Elixirs
LanguageData.AYElixirs.description: Grants the ability to prepare Elixirs.
LanguageData.AYOintments.label: Ointments
LanguageData.AYOintments.description: Grants the ability to prepare ointments.
LanguageData.AYTonics.label: Tonics
LanguageData.AYTonics.description: Grants the ability to prepare tonics.
